detaileddescription.para: This macro can be used to initialize an atomic variable. For example, atomic_tmy_var=ATOMIC_INIT(75);

parameterdescription.para: Value to assign to atomic variable.

detaileddescription.para: This macro can be used to initialize an atomic pointer variable. For example, atomic_ptr_tmy_ptr=ATOMIC_PTR_INIT(&data);

parameterdescription.para: Pointer value to assign to atomic pointer variable.

briefdescription.para: This macro computes the number of atomic variables necessary to represent a bitmap with num_bits.
Define an array of atomic variables.

detaileddescription.para: This macro defines an array of atomic variables containing at least num_bits bits.

simplesect.para: If used from file scope, the bits of the array are initialized to zero; if used from within a function, the bits are left uninitialized.

parameterdescription.para: Name of array of atomic variables.

detaileddescription.para: This routine tests whether bit number bit of target is set or not. The target may be a single atomic variable or an array of them.

parameterdescription.para: Address of atomic variable or array.

simplesect.para: true if the bit was set, false if it wasn't.

briefdescription.para: Atomically test and clear a bit.

detaileddescription.para: Atomically clear bit number bit of target and return its old value. The target may be a single atomic variable or an array of them.

parameterdescription.para: Address of atomic variable or array.

simplesect.para: true if the bit was set, false if it wasn't.

detaileddescription.para: Atomically set bit number bit of target and return its old value. The target may be a single atomic variable or an array of them.

parameterdescription.para: Address of atomic variable or array.

simplesect.para: true if the bit was set, false if it wasn't.

detaileddescription.para: Atomically clear bit number bit of target. The target may be a single atomic variable or an array of them.

parameterdescription.para: Address of atomic variable or array.

detaileddescription.para: Atomically set bit number bit of target. The target may be a single atomic variable or an array of them.

parameterdescription.para: Address of atomic variable or array.

briefdescription.para: Atomically set a bit to a given value.

detaileddescription.para: Atomically set bit number bit of target to value val. The target may be a single atomic variable or an array of them.

parameterdescription.para: Address of atomic variable or array.
